original_text: And they, when they had testified and preached the word of the Lord, returned to Jerusalem, and preached the gospel in many villages of the Samaritans.
korean_text: 두 사도가 주의 말씀을 증언하여 말한 후 예루살렘으로 돌아갈새 사마리아인의 여러 마을에서 복음을 전하니라

sentences.original_text: And they, when they had testified
and preached the word of the Lord
in many villages of the Samaritans
